lenders.name: Dynara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves. I believe we can all make an impact through micro-loans by donating a small amount of money to sponsor entrepreneurs in third world countries. This fund will allow them to develop their own business and help them sustain their economic growth.
lenders.occupational_info: Compassion is what enables us to relate to one another despite the differences in our appearance, status, wealth, personal view, or conviction. True compassion allows us to eradicate those barriers and look at people as People. We are all human beings, we all share the same desire to pursue happiness in our lives; we all want food on our table and a roof over our head; and we all want freedom from suffering. If we can reflect on this thought for a little bit, and realize that we are, in essence, One and the same, I truly believe we all have the power to help one another and act on our compassion.

lenders.name: Theresa & Tim
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Sharon & Melinda

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I feel so blessed.

lenders.name: Anisha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the pay it forward philosophy.  I have received help when I needed it and now it's my turn to help.

Fun. I substitute teach almost everyday for grades K - 12 during the day.

Je vend des services h'hébergement de sites internet, c'est à dire que je gère des serveurs utilisés pour fournir un site internet et le courriel pour des compagnies commerciales, des associations et des individus.

I am learner of life, people, cultures. I am open to anybody that comes my way.

lenders.loan_because: my experiences in South Africa, where small, informal stores sustained many families I lived and worked with, showed me the remarkable impact seemingly small amounts of money can make.

lenders.name: Mitsuaki
lenders.loan_because: I want to be helpful for somebody.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: Lending (instead of giving) encourages those people who are trying to become self-sufficient, instead of waiting for the world to solve all their problems for them.  In addition, if you GIVE someone food or clothing, you take away the oppertunity for someone ELSE in the impoverished area to support themselves by selling food or clothing.  By loaning to resourceful people in the area, you are supporting the role models.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and repair electronic test equipment used in the evaluation of prototype diesel engines.

lenders.name: Scott & Garrett Smith
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to have the ability to do so for so many of those who are in need.

lenders.name: christopher
lenders.loan_because: I have money available, and this seems like a really practical and efficient way of mobilising capital for people who otherwise find it really tough to make a living. It's a lot more useful than Myspace or Facebook.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a journalist (mainly in Latin America), a volunteer in Africa, and a serial starter of companies, mainly in technology-based publishing ventures. I am now a semi-retired investor in start-up companies.

lenders.occupational_info: Allen: I work with software and computer technology. Pam: I am an optician, helping people with their eye glasses and vision needs.

lenders.name: Lauren

lenders.name: Ciancio

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world to better their lives, and seeing the pictures and hearing their stories makes helping them more personal.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate changes to our website, keep our computers up and running and help issue insurance policies for pawnshops.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed and benefit their communities in a positive way.

lenders.name: Ms. Ghost
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people, and as a small business owner, I not only see but fully understand the importance and impact of this sort of action.
lenders.occupational_info: I make different things and try to sell them online, I go to community college, and I work in the framing department and Michael's Arts and Crafts.

lenders.name: Lorry
lenders.loan_because: It's a small but progressive step toward equalizing the world's wealth. I'm grateful to KIVA for giving me a do-able way to make a positive difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint and draw, mainly people. Everything about our planet is astounding, but nothing fascinates me like our own species.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because:
My knowledge of Kiva began when my sister gave me an electronic gift certificate to Kiva for Christmas.

 My husband and I took a huge interest in helping people less privileged than us. 

We lend money because, after being introduced to the organization, we believe in assisting people looking to make a better life for themselves, their families, and their community.

We are especially interested in assisting entrepreneurs involved with renewable energy.


Long story short -- we lend because we can, because morally we should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a palliative care coordinator. Palliative care aims to relieve suffering and improve quality of life for patients with advanced illness and their families. Palliative care is provided by an interdisciplinary team and offered in conjunction with all other appropriate forms of medical treatment. As a nurse coordinator, I work with a team that includes a physician, the nurse, a social worker, a chaplain, and a music therapist. I spend alot of time looking at patient's physical symptoms, but also a significant amount of time is spent dealing with the emotional aspect of the patient and the family.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: To those who are given much, much is expected.

lenders.name: Marlene Boychak
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is how I can give back some of what has been given to me and help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and support programs used for computer or manufacturing process controls.

lenders.name: Abi
lenders.loan_because: if everyone who had a little bit more would reach out to someone who has a little less, we could all significantly reduce the economic disparity in the world, and help the world evolve humanitarially.

lenders.name: Art
lenders.loan_because:
See my Micro Loan VIDEO about reducing extreme poverty in the world,  posted on the web  Go to youtube.com  and search for Art Roberts. The video will come right up at the top. or www.google.com and then search for    theartroberts      and the video will show up right there.

Micro loaning is the most important thing we all must absolutely do and at a minimum of one loan to someone each and every month because Micro loaning instantly improves the world for another person. Besides, the best joyous fun feeling  is created when we share our wealth with another person and see their life improve just because they received that support and love from us.
lenders.occupational_info: I make and provide the most powerful, yet very inexpensive, learning tool games that help all kids, anywhere in the world, memorize the very important basic Adding and Subtracting numbers plus much much more.

lenders.name: Jon & Susan
lenders.loan_because: people helping people

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I come from a small business family.  People with a good ideas, entrepenurial spirit, and the desire to make their lives better should not pass up an opportunity due to  limited finances, especially when the amount of money they need is readily available in a more industrialized country.

lenders.name: Brandon and Jamie
lenders.occupational_info: Long days, lots of travel.

lenders.name: Barbora
lenders.loan_because: I can imagine the direct results, and not merely hope that I'm making a difference. I am confident that the money will be put to good use, and people will improve their situations. And really, even though a student's life is hard, I can do without a couple of bucks.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, taking environmental studies at York University. I'm learning about how political and economic forces affect the environment, and what I can do to help.

lenders.name: Scott and Denise
lenders.loan_because: We love the opportunity to help others help themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: I teach art, dance, music and theater to students from Kindergarten through 8th grade in a very small town in a rural state.

lenders.name: Tiffany

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to put their ideas into action.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: it is a small way that I can help make a difference.

lenders.name: Laura

lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have stories to tell, so their voice will be heard.

lenders.name: wanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. As a small business owner in this country I know how hard it can be to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make people feel good while they are with me. That will help them have a better day which in turn and help others. Pay it forward.

lenders.name: Andre
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people, especially people who work very hard and have a difficult life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in charge of a computer network in a University.

lenders.name: Kellie
lenders.loan_because: it's important to promote and support small businesses across the globe. A healthy global economy includes successful small businesses.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because:
"Find out how much God has given you and from it take what you need; the remainder is needed by others."

---St. Augustine

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: more of us should.

lenders.name: Elijah
lenders.loan_because: Politics aside, we are all one family, and we should take care of each other. Don't believe otherwise!!
lenders.occupational_info: musician/service industry worker (bar/nightclub)

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: God has given His Son for me. I respond with generosity and build His kingdom by encouraging the development of small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I administrate and do audio & video production on various programs for release around the world on DVD & web streaming, in many languages.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major manufacturer in the United States.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: I like to see what a little bit of money and faith in someone can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I studied Political Science, International Relations, and History. I am also a wife and mother

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because: I' d like to help someone support their family and because God has been good to me.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because:
I have a strong interest in social justice, and I believe that micro-financing can help us to accomplish Goal 8 of the Millennium Development Goals. I believe that making a change starts with me.

I also believe in Christ, and my faith compels me to act.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a BSW, I help to connect others to the resources they need to be successful. This may mean connecting them to housing and food, helping to train them for a job, or working through their mental health. 

As a global citizen, I am committed to advocating for those whose voices are not heard. I am both obligated and compelled to fight for social justice.

As an non-profit staff member, I am part of a workforce development program for young adults in our nation's capital in order to empower them to take advantage of the opportunities that education provides. For our program, this includes GED education and construction training, per the YouthBuild model.

lenders.name: Myra, Hanky and Chip
lenders.loan_because: giving something back to the world is important to us. More than anything, its our way to help someone make their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher, my son Hank is 12 years old; he started his own business three years ago, and my  son Myron "Chip" is 4 years old.

lenders.name: Asaf
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if others do not have the same opportunities we do, but they are still willing to work towards bettering their life, we should help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I want to raise awareness towards the poverty in the world. Many people do not understand that even though we "need" the money, many actually need it to survive.

A small donation will not change my life, but it will it might change someone else's.

lenders.name: Kjetil
lenders.loan_because: Because i think Kiva represents a fantastic opportunity for me to make a difference for real people, and i know the money is put to better use than if i kept them in my bank.

lenders.name: cindy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my husband sell seafood that he catches off of his boat.

lenders.name: Toby and Miles
lenders.loan_because: to help people who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying lots of things to get smarter

lenders.name: Jane

We were so proud of her for investing in other peoples lives.  Couldn't wait to get started with our own account.  Have totally enjoyed loaning and reading about the progress of our people.  Also have been inspired to give gift certificates to get others involved. What at great idea!

lenders.name: richard & rickie kendall
lenders.loan_because: its a place to start to make a change in the world
lenders.occupational_info: tradesman

lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy helping protect and enhance natural resources using fire as a tool.

lenders.occupational_info: I manage operations at a small medical device company that makes products that help physicians diagnose cancer.

lenders.occupational_info: We record and produce Voice Overs for TV, radio and corporations all over the world.

lenders.loan_because: i loan because for develop my business. I have a little business. i sell book, equipment education   to school & traditional market.  order to, i can change in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: i buy to distributor, then i re-seller to buyer/retailer. i have margin bruto 30-45%.

lenders.occupational_info: I use the law and the U.S. legal system to help citizens protect the environment and our natural resources.

lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning directly to a person and knowing exactly how I am helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I solve puzzles using computers.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I live a comfortable life and I want to share what the Lord has given me with those who need help improving their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software for a small manufacturing company.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: all people attempting to better themselves should be encouraged.
lenders.occupational_info: Married, two children, work hard / play hard.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: My family wanted to do something together to help others. This is a family project that we hope to continue to grow a little at a time.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: My father gave each of his children a Kiva gift certificate, so I continually re-loan to improve the quality of life around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently a student studying Mechanical Engineering with an emphasis studying Fluid Dynamics.

lenders.name: Andrew M.
lenders.loan_because: It such a small thing to do, but means a lot to the people who are trying so hard to support their families with their entrepreneurial ideas.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a business manager for a Daily newspaper.

lenders.name: Deana
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a hand sometime.

lenders.name: Erin and Sara
lenders.loan_because: Our dad introduced us to this site and gave us money to loan to KIVA for Christmas.  We would like to get more involved in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Erin and Sara joined KIVA as kids, and now are all grown up. Erin is a graduate student at Stanford studying Developmental biology, and Sara is an undergrad at UCSB studying Aquatic biology. Every so often they log back in and relend their money to new people, 7 years running!

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a testament to how a little help can go a long way. It helps people help themselves, which allows for a sustainable and lasting impact. Organizations like Kiva are sending a message that any average person can make a difference and fight poverty.

lenders.name: Marathon Communications
lenders.loan_because: We believe that we are making a difference in lives with our work and we want to extend our success to other enterpreneurs in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a corporate training company that helps employees to be more successful in their work and we support managers to be better leaders.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the difference it makes.
lenders.occupational_info: International development

lenders.name: Shujaat
lenders.loan_because: i want donations to continue my higher education.

lenders.name: Marissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with businesses in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am going to medical school to become a doctor.

lenders.name: Burt
lenders.loan_because: I'm spreading the love

lenders.name: Lauren and Tony
lenders.loan_because: Mankind is my business...
lenders.occupational_info: Education of children, ages 7-10.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and because I am a small business person myself and know the value of having the capital needed to get to the next level.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a network administrator (I take care of lots of computers) and I also do consulting for small businesses.

lenders.name: JSL
lenders.loan_because: A small change can make a great difference.

lenders.name: Garrett
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I make drinks and serve food.

lenders.name: Sietske
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deservice a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my 5 year old son, and my baby daughter . And I study for social worker. I would like to work with childeren, when my daughter goes to school.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because:
“No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.” 
― Charles Dickens

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: it will likely do some good, more good than the money will do here.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of pregnant women and do surgery.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I so agree with Kiva's philosophy of empowering people to help themselves and not just given a "hand-out". I do this as well, (donate to charities) but there is a more satisfying feeling to know that people are doing best when helping themselves and that I have been a small part in supporting them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired elementary educator having taught 3rd grade through 6th grade. Also a specialized kinesiologist, teaching courses and writing articles, presentations, books for people to help themselves be well naturally.

lenders.name: Stijn
lenders.loan_because: I have it and they don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computer games to hardware manufacturers.

lenders.name: Gerald
lenders.loan_because: It's great to collaborate in something worthwhile.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I believe that God provides some people with the ability and the opportunity to share their blessings with others. It is only by sheer luck and circumstance that I have as much wealth as I have. It is my responsibility to be a productive steward of that wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites and make commercials for businesses to advertise their products.

lenders.name: Cameron' Dad
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving a hand-up instead of a hand-out.  A rising tide raises all ships.
lenders.occupational_info: We produce energy using solar panels and wind turbines.  In turn, we sell that electricity to the major utilities.

lenders.name: Georgia
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Whimiscal

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because:
Although the world is full of suffering it is also full of the overcoming of it.

My wish and goal in life is to make a less fortunate person fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Internet Online marketing Entrepreneur who helps people build businesses and friendships as well as support Charity.

lenders.name: Pieter
lenders.loan_because: I Care

lenders.name: Rui
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is possible, with a little help from those who can, to change the lives of people with whom we share the common pursuit of happiness
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the field of Corporate Social Responsibility and try to help the company I work for to fulfill its goals and expectations concerning its social and environmental responsibility

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: To help business owners reach their goals.

lenders.name: Kennon
lenders.loan_because: i have been given much, and now it's time to give back

lenders.name: Linda Sullivan
lenders.loan_because: My sons gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday. They know that giving to others is what makes me happiest. I have been so fortunate to live in the USA, have a good education and a steady income. I want to help others get a rung up on the economic ladder so they can educate their children. I believe that education is the key to preventing future wars and creating the opportunity to grow and care for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a public health nurse. I track contagious diseases and work to prevent the spread of illness. I teach people how to be healthy and live more fully into a healthy old age.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I lived in Nairobi, Kenya, when I was young and saw how much of a difference access to credit can mean for people.  "Banker to the Poor" by Mohammad Yunus, founder of Grameen Bank, is also very inspiring.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to start new businesses and also to fix businesses which are not doing so well.  I have mostly worked in software and high technology, my most recent business openned 10 offices in developing countries around the world and sought to better the lives of all citizens in each of these regions.

lenders.name: MagazineEspresso
lenders.loan_because: Giving is living, my friend.
lenders.occupational_info: Espresso Bar

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want people to be able to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a refinery; making gasoline, diesel and jet fuels.

lenders.name: John & Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: it encourages sustainable growth, it's empowering, and it makes financial sense.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to lend a helping hand to others who are making their own way and working to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies make their websites work harder and smarter.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has the right to capital to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage business support operations (finances, contracts, supply chain, projects/program management) for IT Services engagements.

lenders.name: Andréia
lenders.loan_because: Eu adoro trabalhar com animais..
lenders.occupational_info: Meu objetivo é de montar um negócio com cães,montar um cemitério de cães onde seus donos possam ao final da vida de seus animais,deixa-los descansar em um lugar onde possam visitá-los e matar a saudade,para tanto preciso de algo em torno de$6.000 dólares,tive a idéia de criar esse espaço,quando perdi meu cãozinho,que durante muito tempo foi meu grande amigo e companheiro,naregião onde moro ainda não há esse tipo de lugar,por isso acredito que seja um ótimo negócio,e com um risco muito pequeno,quase nulo de não dar certo...

lenders.name: Michaela & Austin
lenders.loan_because: we can and are following the example set by our parents.

lenders.name: Joerg
lenders.loan_because: It helps others to fulfill their endeavours of entrepreneurship, to make a living  and to become more independent.
lenders.occupational_info:
Responsible for a porcelain manufactury still producing in the purest sense of the 18th century.
Preserving a tradition of 260 years of craftmanship at the highest level and being avantgarde in porcelain at the same time.

lenders.name: DSU TR Scholars
lenders.loan_because: We believe we can change the world for the better one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of honors students attending Dickinson State University.

lenders.name: Aubree
lenders.loan_because: I cannot be aware of suffering and do nothing.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I can and care

lenders.name: UIUC SPAN 332
lenders.loan_because: The class is entitled "Spanish & Entrepreneurship: Languages, Cultures & Communities." We focus on social entrepreneurship, and through Kiva, students are learning what can be accomplished in Latin America through social e-ship.
lenders.occupational_info: I (Ann Abbott) am a professor of Spanish at the University of Illinois.  I am interested in community-based learning and social entrepreneurship in US Latino and Latin American communties.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I know that my help can have a big impact on someone who is working hard to change their life.

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: Estou com uma loja online de calçados e não tenho o valor inicial para começar o negócio.
lenders.occupational_info: Loja online  de venda de calçados para todas as idades.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: ... it works.
lenders.occupational_info: My work helps my boss do his work. of financial/investment consulting  I arrange travel, pay the bills ... plus a whole host of other miscellaneous things that keep me busy and my job interesting.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people start and expand their businesses. I know what its like to not have enough money to do everything you'd like to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with engineers at my company and and manufacturers around the USA. I help find suppliers for office furniture components.

lenders.name: Siva
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who work hard to earn a living.

lenders.name: Ritu
lenders.loan_because: I want to help woman around the world create a better life for themselves and their families
lenders.occupational_info: My job is extremely rewarding because I help people by making sure that they have access to the medications that they need.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I want to show my children that a small contribution for me can make a big difference to somebody else.

lenders.name: Csilla
lenders.loan_because: I want to give to those who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: office job

lenders.name: Charline
lenders.loan_because: I can:) Every little bit helps!

lenders.name: Seema
lenders.loan_because: because i love the fact that by pooling our resources we can all make the world a better place for those who need a helping hand, however small it may be.
lenders.occupational_info: i keep track of money for a big healthcare provider in virginia

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I have seen the life-changing effects of small loans first hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites.

lenders.name: Kai
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy to support such a great idea as microlending. This idea has the potential to improve our world and can give efficent support to people in developing countries.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Someone needs it more than me.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of human beings to strive to better their own life and the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student seeking a degree in business.  I have started my own non-profit organization that  gives money to help other students like myself.  When I graduate I want to start other businesses and some day be a major lender to people with bright ideas.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like having a direct connection to the party that funds are lent to, I like getting feedback on how my modest contributions have contributed to the borrowers' success, and it makes me more aware of the challenges faced by people in parts of the world that i know very little about.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We all have dreams and goals and to succeed and accomplish is a beautiful feeling. I believe this feeling is a right and not a privelage. I believe that economic circumstance should not hinder a person who has the drive and passion to go to the next level. I would like to help those achieve what all of us essentially strive to achieve.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I know how tough running a business is
lenders.occupational_info: I own a health food store/laundromat, and also work nights putting sports pages together for newspapers

lenders.name: Maia
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone should be given the chance to earn a decent living , and sometimes all they need is a small push to get them rolling
lenders.occupational_info: I help to get the newest medical technologies tested and made available to those who need them.

lenders.name: Maria
James
lenders.loan_because: It just feels like the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Earlham College. I'm studying Music and Computer Science, but I'm still unsure as to what I am going to do with my life.

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: When I make a loan, I'm not just investing money.  I find that I become interested in the person who receives the loan, their business, their family, their part of the world.  It enriches me, and expands my horizons.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people who program computers.

lenders.name: katherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people change their worlds, as I have received help to change my own. I could not have started my business without the support of others.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: it is good to feel that with the little extra that you have you can help someone take a big step towards a better future.

lenders.name: Kevin Miles
lenders.loan_because: It's a great, direct way to help people.  and watch it change someone's quality of life.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: My main goal on Kiva is to help female artists.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: We are all that we have.  We must help each other get on our feet.  We have to reach out to those less fortunate than we are, who have a dream, and aspire to make a better life for themselves. We must take a chance on each other that good still exists in the world, and that we to can have an impact. Our legacy is those we helped, and lives we touched along the way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a marketing manager for a large constuction company, and working on my B.S in Nursing.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: My giving is based on a simple formula: "I love because God first loved me" plus "As you do it unto the least of these you do it unto me" add "To whom much has been given much is required" = Giving to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Employee Assistance Counselor working with businesses and non-profits.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: I've been extraordinarily lucky, and consider it an honor to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books and short stories.

lenders.name: Arnie, Kelli and Nathan
lenders.loan_because: We have been so fortunate and want to assist others
lenders.occupational_info: We own and operate a book and gift store

lenders.name: hedningarna
lenders.loan_because: The small and remote Bouvetøya [Bouvet Island] also want to take part in developping the world - and started to loan with microcredits.

lenders.name: CS Management
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it allows us to learn about elements of management in concrete ways. Our funds come from our local SIFE - Students in Free Enterprise organization.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students studying management at a two-year college in Cincinnati, OH.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help small businesses, particularly those run by women, succeed.

lenders.name: Samuel and Janice
lenders.loan_because: we believe that people everywhere should have the opportunity to pursue their goals for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both pastors servicng Christian congregtions in the US.

lenders.name: Inness
lenders.loan_because: rejoice!!!

lenders.name: Muhammad Rashid
lenders.loan_because: To  grow my business. And through that income I can build house for my family.
lenders.occupational_info: I m a farmer. Breeding cows and buffaloes. Through loan I want to increase my animals number. So the production of milk increase and i get more profit.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: God made a world of abundance... there is more than enough for everybody is each person only takes the share of it that they truly need...
lenders.occupational_info: to recognize that we are ALL in relationship with one another.... we are all connected.   Once we recognize this basic tenet, how we live will change.   It is only when I recognize my brother, my sister, in need, will I step up and do the right thing.   We are one.

lenders.name: Regan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful way to help others establish themselves financially.  It is a pleasure to give!
lenders.occupational_info: I am semi-retired.  I am a land development consultant and land surveyor.

lenders.name: Arad
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the model and want to help others.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: A hand up is better than a hand out

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to help make the world a better place and this seems like a great way  to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: My passion lies in photography, philanthropy, wildlife and conservation.

lenders.name: Rani
lenders.loan_because: I have witnessed the miracles that a conduit for entrepreneurship and innovation can achieve for people with little hope, even in the midst of turmoil. This is the universal language: the ability to realize one’s dreams and creations. Without a supportive network and a means to achieve these goals, countless entrepreneurs will surely face further disenfranchisement and despair in a world facing increasingly complex social and economic challenges.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I believe small business success generates a way out of poverty for the owners as well as others around them.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I'm at a point where I can, and I'd like to make a difference.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: i dep--eely care about less fortunate poeple
lenders.occupational_info: s

lenders.name: International Club
lenders.loan_because: As the International Club of University of Portland, we want to reach out to the rest of the world by helping communities continue to grow.  Each academic year, we fundraise hundreds of dollars to support developing economies specifically in areas that our students call home.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of international and US students that represent 32 different countries.  We promote friendship, mutual understanding, and acceptance among persons from various cultural backgrounds within our community. We encourage justice, unity, and peace by organizing social and philanthropic activities.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: It's fascinating and fun to follow the progress made with such a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English woman managing a small convenience store/gas station owned by two Indian men in The USA. We are truly an international outfit despite being small! The store is open 24/7. Our receipts are $3500 - $ $200 daily. The store is run by myself, an assistant manager, 2 full time cashiers and 2 part time cashiers. Besides gas/petrol, diesel and kerosene/parafin, we sell hot and cold beverages, candy, snacks, groceries, auto supplies, cigarettes, prepaid cell phone minutes, moneygrams and lottery tickets. We do not sell alcohol. We take cash, checks, travellers checks,  credit and debit cards.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to be Canadian and want everyone to have the chances that I get
lenders.occupational_info: I go to elementry school in Canada

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I have a cousin who was adopted from Ethiopia and think it's really cool what this orginization is doing, and it makes sense!
lenders.occupational_info: I learn stuff that I (hopefully) will using later in life...

lenders.name: Mona
lenders.loan_because: It's a very good idea.  My friends invited me and I intend to continue lending after the loan is paid.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: This is the solution which will end the hideous gap between rich and poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead active travel tours all over the world, currently specializing in the Pacific Northwest of the United States.  More relevantly, I am an entrepreneur trying to start my own travel company with microfinance as a component.

lenders.name: Mimi, Diana & Pati
lenders.loan_because: The True joy of Life is to help others, and by doing so you will truly feel ALIVE!!
lenders.occupational_info: It is so rewarding for us to help those in need.  Helping others helps to put things into perspective!

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people succeed at their work.
lenders.occupational_info: I write programs for computers and small devices.  The programs tell the devices what to do and how to do it.

lenders.name: Jolley Family
lenders.loan_because: we are a family that has received many blessings and we would like to help bless the lives of others
lenders.occupational_info: I create colorful, eye-catching images for companies to use on their computers.  I also create web pages so companies can share their ideas via the internet.

lenders.name: Markell
lenders.loan_because: We all deserve a chance to achieve our dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I am am real estate investor/developer

lenders.name: Marin
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an undergraduate student at the University of South Carolina, studying international business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe the majority of people don't want handouts or to feel they can't make it on their own.  I truly think many just need a little helping hand to get them on the path to making it on their own.  Kiva appears to be a vehicle to help make that happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and implement website applications.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I want to support their passion and their drive to move forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide investment opportunities to individuals and companies across the world.

lenders.name: Jay & Mona
lenders.occupation: Engineer & Librarian - Both Mizzou grads; both retired.
lenders.loan_because: ...there is JOY in GIVING someone an OPPORTUNITY to make their life/lives better.  And the JOY is MULTIPLIED when I have the OPPORTUNITY to re-loan the PRINCIPAL that returns to us...

lenders.name: B.J. Spamer
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a U.S. non-profit organization, handling cases of long-term missing and unidentified deceased children.

lenders.name: Kyle Baer
lenders.loan_because: This is a free market approach to enabling entrepreneurs in third world countries. By providing these countries with access to capital, we can help them improve their infrastructure and create sustainable enterprises.

lenders.name: YETI  Students
lenders.loan_because: We would like to share our blessings and use our money and talent to help people across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: We are high school students from St. Scholastica's College, Manila, Philippines. We raise funds by buying and selling wholesale products and we believe in making tithing a habit.

lenders.name: Philip Townsend
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate my entire life and now that I am retired, I want to do something tangible to help people in other parts of the world improve their standards of living on a basis that is sustainable.
lenders.occupational_info: I provided advice to businesses; large, medium and small to help them become more efficient, effective and successful.  I have travelled extensively around the world for both pleasure and business and this afforded me the opportunity to see that our basic needs are the same the world over.  Since retiring in June 2011, I do some consulting and am working on my first novel.

lenders.name: Martin & Debi
lenders.loan_because: We know what it is to be an entrepreneur and we want to help people realize their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Martin has a business renting recreational vehicles for vacations.  Debi is a nurse practitioner caring for older people who live in nursing homes.
